name: coolify
description: An open-source & self-hostable Heroku / Netlify alternative.

scripts.db:studio:container: docker exec coolify pnpm run --filter api db:studio
scripts.db:migrate:container: docker exec coolify pnpm run --filter api db:migrate
scripts.format:api: cross-env NODE_ENV=development pnpm run --filter api format
scripts.lint:api: cross-env NODE_ENV=development pnpm run --filter api lint
scripts.dev:container: docker-compose -f docker-compose-dev.yaml up --build -d || docker compose -f docker-compose-dev.yaml up --build -d
scripts.dev:api: cross-env NODE_ENV=development pnpm run --filter api dev
scripts.dev:server: cross-env NODE_ENV=development pnpm run --filter server dev
scripts.dev:client: cross-env NODE_ENV=development pnpm run --filter client dev
scripts.dev:ui: cross-env NODE_ENV=development pnpm run --filter ui dev
scripts.build-trpc: cross-env NODE_ENV=production pnpm run --filter server build && pnpm run --filter client build && cp ./apps/server/package.json build/ && cd build/ && pnpm install -p .
scripts.build:api: cross-env NODE_ENV=production pnpm run --filter api build
scripts.build:ui: cross-env NODE_ENV=production pnpm run --filter ui build
scripts.release:staging:amd: docker build -t ghcr.io/coollabsio/coolify:v3 . && docker push ghcr.io/coollabsio/coolify:v3
scripts.release:local: rm -fr ./local-serve && mkdir ./local-serve && pnpm build && cp -Rp apps/api/build/* ./local-serve && cp -Rp apps/ui/build/ ./local-serve/public && cp -Rp apps/api/prisma/ ./local-serve/prisma && cp -Rp apps/api/package.json ./local-serve && env | grep '^COOLIFY_' > ./local-serve/.env && cd ./local-serve && pnpm install . && pnpm start
